_comment: Copy this file to partners.json. Controls partner plugin load orchestration. Ready events are auto-derived as plugin.{name}.complete

blocking._comment: Plugins that must complete before ad requests. Each has individual timeout.
blocking.name: gpt

independent._comment: Must have before GAM, but no order required. Share independentTimeout.
independent.name: audienceProvider

nonCore._comment: No GAM dependency - loads independently. Share nonCoreTimeout.
nonCore.name: analytics
